name: Real Taxi Parking 3D Game
description:
Real Taxi Grand City Parking Simulator

Real Taxi parking 3d Simulator is one of the most awesome parking games of 2016.
where you are able to drive through a very realistic city.

Real Taxi parking 3d Simulator is totally free & Realistic Driving experience and has many amazing realistic levels.

Your goal in this game is to park in the designated locations while avoiding obstacles. There is a time limit to keep you on your toes! and So much Different Parking Level and earn coin and purchase a more Luxurious Taxi car Driver Experiance.

Your precision driving skills will be tested and pushed to the limit! However be careful not to crush or the game is over.

Key features:

=> Exciting taxi driving missions and level progressions
=> Realistic 3D city graphics
=> amazingly realistic taxi game
=> Simulator driving smooth controls
=> Full 3D large environment
